name: Chocolate Explosion Cake
description:
A perfect treat for your chocoholic lover. Three layers of moist chocolate cake sandwiched with chocolate ganache topped with all sorts of chocolate varieties.

description:

name: Strawberry Chocolate Cake
description:
This dark chocolate strawberry cake is made with 4 layers of moist dark chocolate cake and sandwiched with real fresh strawberry buttercream. It`s covered with fresh strawberry butter cream and topped with a chocolate ganache that drips beautifully for a stunning and delicious touch. Also topped with two chocolate covered strawberries.

Ingredients: Butter, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, baking soda, vanilla, eggs, cocoa powder, fresh strawberry puree, dark chocolate, chocolate covered fresh strawberries, chocolate ganache

name: Chocolate Nightmare Cake
description:
Chocolate nightmare cake is super moist, fudgy, and decadent. This 4-layer rich chocolate cake is a chocolate lover`s dream come true. You need to impress someone` Serve up this cake! It will make any moment memorable.

Ingredients: Butter, granulated brown sugar, powdered sugar, all-purpose flour, baking soda, vanilla, eggs, cocoa powder, dark chocolate, milk chocolate, chocolate ganache, heavy cream, rum flavour

name: Lemoncurd Vanilla Cake
description: Moist Vanilla cake sandwiched with a lemony vanilla butter cream and lemon curd made in three layers. This decadent cake is topped with orange and mango truffles and strawberries.
